description: The concept of work-life balance in terms of gender Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) focuses on creating a supportive environment that allows employees of all genders to effectively manage their professional responsibilities alongside personal or family obligations.

Video 2 | Gender Bias: Are You Overly Influenced by Your Own Prejudices? | 10 Min
